column1: #Text=" Korra says : " Are you going to stay in your room feeling sorry for yourself all day ?
#Text=You owe Opal an apology for the way you treated her last night .
#Text=" Lin says : " What did you do to me ?
#Text=" Guo says : " I tried to warn you .
#Text=" Lin says : " So , you 're robbing stores with the Terra Triad now ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " I did n't steal anything .
#Text=" Lin says : " I 'm not letting you get away with this .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Oh , what are you going to do , Officer ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Do n't even think about taking one more step !
